title: Instructional Design Strategies to Enhance Educational Video Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies in creating and utilizing social studies educational videos in simulation and VR environments for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design summary and explanation prompting strategies for video content by applying generative activity principles
Learners can explain methods to effectively control visual flow within screens using gaze-guiding techniques
Learners can demonstrate concept visualization skills through video production simulations reflecting dynamic drawing principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
